changelog.html.name: Changelog
changelog.html.description: Project changelog describing changes since initial release.

code.html.name: Contributing code
code.html.description: Describes how code can be contributed to the project.

demos.html.name: Demos
demos.html.description: Holds the list of available demos.

download.html.name: Download
download.html.description: Page where you can download custom Simone build. Server is required for this page if you like to run this repository locally, but no server side language is needed.

index.html.name: Documentation
index.html.description: Main documentation page, It serves as general introduction to Simone, and as a resource list.

installation.html.name: Installation
installation.html.description: How to add Simone to your project, and what dependencies are required.

issues.html.name: Issues
issues.html.description: Explains the process of reporting bugs to bugtracker and using issue tracker for other things.

nonTechnicalContributions.html.name: Non-technical contributions
nonTechnicalContributions.html.description: Describes how people can contribute to the project with only minimal technical skills, or no technical skills at all.

stylingGuide.html.name: Styling guide
stylingGuide.html.description: Describes key areas where CSS customization can by applied.

taskbar.html.name: Taskbar
taskbar.html.description: Taskbar widget documentation, containing description of options, events, and methods available.

tests.html.name: Tests
tests.html.description: List of available test suites, along with instruction on how to write new tests and how to report failing tests.

upgradeGuide.html.name: Upgrade guide
upgradeGuide.html.description: Tells which libraries should be upgraded, how, and when.

window.html.name: Window
window.html.description: Window widget documentation, containing description of options, events, and methods available.
